snippet.title: TOY SOLDIERS!! Landfall VR Oculus Rift Gameplay - Virtual Reality
snippet.description:
In this video I check out Landfall VR using the Oculus Rift and Xbox One Elite Controller. This is an awesome top down twin stick shooter. This is an Oculus exclusive and available on the Oculus store for £22.99. This also works with Revive for Vive users.

Thanks for watching []-) 

Please hit the like button if you enjoyed the video. If you have any feedback please let me know in the comments so I can improve my future videos.

Subscribe here - 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsmk8NDVMct75j_Bfb9Ah7w?sub_confirmation=1

Contact me on Facebook here - @virtualrealityoasis

https://instagram.com/virtualrealityoasis

Email me here - contact@virtualrealityoasis.com

The equipment I use to create videos -
Rode Smart Lav+
Canon 750D
Logitech C920 Pro

My Pc Specs -
Skylake Intel Core i7-6700k 
Nvidia GeForce GTX Titan X
Asus Maximus Formula VIII 
Corsair 16 GB DDR4
Custom Water Loop
